content:
The SHC Vaccination & Testing FHIR IG will begin having meetings every two weeks starting Wednesday, May 5 at 12pm Eastern as part of our move into HL7 for IG development. These meetings are open to the public, and we encourage anyone interested in the IG content -- especially implementers to attend.

More info, including the Zoom link: https://confluence.hl7.org/x/4oafBg

Max Masnick said:

The SHC Vaccination & Testing FHIR IG will begin having meetings every two weeks starting Wednesday, May 5 at 12pm Eastern as part of our move into HL7 for IG development. These meetings are open to the public, and we encourage anyone interested in the IG content -- especially implementers to attend.

More info, including the Zoom link: https://confluence.hl7.org/x/4oafBg

Reminder of our public meeting today at 12pm Eastern. We will be discussing international vocabulary support, and do a Q&A on IG content.
